subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a multiplayer trade, the Marlins sent five players, including shortstop Jose Reyes and the starting pitchers Mark Buehrle and Josh Johnson, to the Blue Jays for a group of prospects.
snippet: In a multiplayer trade, the Marlins sent five players, including shortstop Jose Reyes and the starting pitchers Mark Buehrle and Josh Johnson, to the Blue Jays for a group of prospects.
